players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia. He must have killed Diana."
You: "I think Charlie is the mafia."
Bob: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Alice knows this. So she is guilty. Charlie is innocent."
Charlie: "Bob, your investigation matches. Alice claims I'm mafia, but I see no evidence. I vote Alice."
Bob: "I confirm Alice is mafia, she knows I'm detective, so she will try to deflect. Vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia. He must have killed Diana."
Alice: "I think Charlie is the mafia."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Alice knows this. So she is guilty. Charlie is innocent."
Charlie: "Bob, your investigation matches. Alice claims I'm mafia, but I see no evidence. I vote Alice."
Alice: "..."
You: "I confirm Alice is mafia, she knows I'm detective, so she will try to deflect. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
